globalLimitAtmSelected.description:
Global Atm limit
Must not exceed the offer partner value
If not set, the default limit specified in the offer will be used

globalLimitPaymentSelected.description:
Global Payment limit
Must not exceed the offer partner value
If not set, the default limit specified in the offer will be used

hint.description: The pan hint value of the card.

partnerCode.description: Gets or sets the partner code.

offerPartnerCode.description: Gets or sets the offer partner code.

wishPin.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [wish pin].

oldExternalRef.description: Gets or sets the old external reference.

isVadBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is vad blocked.

isGeoBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is geo blocked.

holderExternalRef.description: Gets or sets the holder external reference.

isWithdrawalAtTheCounterAllowed.description: Is Withdrawal at the counter allowed.

CardFactory.Application.Card.CreateStock.description: Data of creation of a new stock of virtual cards

partnerCode.description: Gets or sets the partner code.

isAlphaTest.description: Defines if card is in alpha test

globalLimitAtmSelected.description:
Global Atm limit
Must not exceed the offer partner value
If not set, the default limit specified in the offer will be used

globalLimitPaymentSelected.description:
Global Payment limit
Must not exceed the offer partner value
If not set, the default limit specified in the offer will be used

hint.description: The pan hint value of the card.

oldExternalRef.description: Gets or sets the old Card external reference.

isWithdrawalAtTheCounterAllowed.description: Is Withdrawal at the counter allowed.

globalLimitAtmSelected.description: Gets or sets the global limit atm selected

globalLimitPaymentSelected.description: Gets or sets the global limit payment selected

cardBlocked.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the card is blocked

isVadBlocked.description: Gets or sets the value indicating if VAD payments are blocked.

foreignPaymentBlocked.description: Gets or sets the block/ unblock foreign card transactions

cardEventCode.description:
Opposition event.
Defines the current state of the card request.

cardEventStatusCode.description:
Card event status.
Defines the current state of the card request.

wpReasonCodes.description:
From 0100 f125 (Supporting Information), dsi02 (Wallet Provider), tag07 (Wallet provider reason codes). 
Up to 15 2-byte hex reason codes from 01 to 0E.	(Exception: Apple Pay Orange Condition reason code will be 0G, not a hex value.)

panSource.description: From 0100 f125 (Supporting Information), dsi02 (Wallet Provider), tag08 (Pan Source).  2-byte hex value from 01 to 03.

wpDeviceScore.description: From 0100 f125 (Supporting Information), dsi02 (Wallet Provider), tag05 (Wallet Provider Device Score).  Value from 1 to 5 (most trusted).

wpAccountScore.description: From 0100 f125 (Supporting Information), dsi02 (Wallet Provider), tag06 (Wallet Provider Account Score).  Value from 1 to 5 (most trusted).

riskAssessmentScore.description: From 0100 f62.21 (Online Risk Assessment Risk Score and Reason Codes) positions 1, 2 (Risk Score).  Value from 01  99.

tokenProvisioningScore.description: From 0100 f123 (Verification Data), dsi68 (Token Data), tag10 (Visa Token Score).  Value from 01  99.

otpReason.description: Reason for Getting OTP resolution Methods

otpMaxReached.description: This field describes whether the Token has exceeded the number OTP requests and so is no longer a supported method for that token

value.description:
Verification Method value,Could be masked value, depends on type.
For Example: ip**** @gmail.com

identifier.description: Unique and opaque identifier for this method.

CardFactory.Application.Holder.GetHolder.description: response verification methods for card holder
